mainText:
I cried today when I heard of Steve's death. I have been an Apple user since
 1984 and have enjoyed watching all the changes and innovations over the years. Many of them under Steve's direction. Even though I expected to hear of his death in the near future... I was not prepared for it so soon. My condolences to his family and friends. I will finish with an old Irish Proverb.

"Death leaves a heartache no one can heal. Love leaves a memory no one can steal"

Rest in Peace Steve Jobs.
author: Donna
